title: Yesterday
description:
This week on Spoiler Specials, Sam Adams, Inkoo Kang and Chris Molanphy spoil Yesterday. What’s wrong with the movie’s vision of the 2019 music landscape? What was Eleonor Rigby about again? Who’s the best Beatle? Listen to them discuss!
Podcast production by Danielle Hewitt. Engineering by Merritt Jacob.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
